summary: Retex of Wolf Armor (darker with improved gardbraces/pauldrons).
descriptionHtml:
This is a \'simple\' retexture of the Wolf armour.  I felt the vanilla was just lacking somehow... perhaps the godsawful gardbraces.  I darkened the base metal, lightened the scroll-work, and tried to make the gardbraces/pauldrons look a bit better by adding scroll-work.

[center][IMG]http://i10.photobucket.com/albums/a124/Artemas13/Steam/Vilkas.jpg[/IMG][/center]


I did this half as an experiment with GIMP and half as compensation to my sister (who also plays) for putting up with my rambling about mods.  :)

If not using NMM, to manually uninstall: Delete \"wolf\" folder in Skyrim>Data>textures>armor

[b][u]Check out my other mods:[/u][/b]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31567]Vlindrel Hall Reborn[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21374]Understone Keep Fountains and Rubble[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31897]Faces of Skyrim[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32359]Simply Improved Breezehome[/url]

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Changelog:

01-17-2012 v02:  I missed a spot... ugh.  Fixed the lower edge of the female torso just above the belt.  :)

02-14-2012 v1.2 Hi Res version added

02-24-2012 v03:  Corrected colouring on boots for low res version

02-26-2012 v1.3: Hi Res version boot and helmet brightness/contrast fix to better match torso. Alt Helm file added.

02-17-2013: Filename update to make mod easier to locate in search.
author: Venatoris
